title: help pls
body:
ok so i factory resetted my pc and now this happens:


-gold popping up after minion kill about 2 seconds late
-spells appearing to cast twice
-hero stutter movement
-general delay on screen, people dying after appearing to stand still, etc....

my ping was the same before the factory reset (140)

can anyone help me im kinda new

replies.body: Sounds like you're having some heavy input delay, which could be due to a network issue.  I suggest going through each step in our [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to help you get this resolved.  Let me know if you have any questions!
